 2 build task

1) One is the 'seeeye-drop' 'for the customer or QA tests,and the web application is deployed into following URL:
 
http://221.137.74.189
 
 
 This buildis trigged manually insteadof daily. By default it will run every 100days.
 
2) Another is 'seeeye-nightly' for the nightly build and the web application is deployed into following URL:
 
http://221.137.74.189/dailybuild/
 
 This build is trigged daily 0:00AM.



If you want to force build, just go to 
http://221.137.74.189:8080/dashboard/tab/builds

and choose one task, for example 'seeeye-nightly", and click the force build button.
